name: Hack Tahoe
tagline: Lake Tahoe's Code for America Brigade
body:
### Want To Help Lake Tahoe Communities?
#### Good, we could use your help.
We are a [Code for America Brigade](http://codeforamerica.org/brigade), which means we're volunteers that contribute our talents toward improving the way our local governments and community organizations use the web. The Brigade is about action and you're here because you are someone who takes action.

### We're just getting started.
Apple was founded by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne on April 1, 1976. This fun fact has nothing to do with our Brigade, except we're officially launched this group exactly 40 years later.

### We're looking for government partners around the lake.
Please reach out if your organization is interested in collaborating with us around technology-based civic projects. Bring your own project ideas or invite us to brainstorm with you.

### Founding Members
* Ben Damman (@typesend)
* Matt McFarland
* Jeffrey Booth (@Tahcoder)
* Jamie Orr (@jamieforr)

### For More Information
Email ben (dot) damman [@] gmail (dot) com
